title: Use local /data.json for prompt data URL

requirements.text: Update the frontend data source constant so the app uses the local path for the prompts JSON: change `const DATA_URL = 'https://viralprompts.in/data.json';` to `const DATA_URL = '/data.json';` in `frontend/src/services/viralPromptsClient.ts`.

quotes: change const DATA_URL = 'https://viralprompts.in/data.json'; into const DATA_URL = '/data.json';

acceptanceCriteria: No remaining references in the frontend code to the hardcoded URL `https://viralprompts.in/data.json`.
When `fetchViralPrompts()` is used, it requests `/data.json` from the same origin (relative URL).

constraints: Do not edit any files under the listed frontend immutable paths (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui`).
nonGoals: Do not change backend fetching/outcall behavior.
Do not redesign UI or alter prompt parsing/validation logic beyond the URL constant update.
